name: Aloo Paratha (Flat Bread stuffed with Spicy potatoes) Moms recipe.
description: Aloo Paratha (Indian flat bread stuffed with spicy Potatoes). An absolutely delicious and easy to follow recipe. Vegan and nut free.
recipeIngredient: 1  or 2 Serrano chili finely chopped (depending on the spice level you want)
1/2 cup whole wheat pastry flour for use during kneading and rolling
1/2 teaspoon red chili powder or black pepper

itemListElement.text: Boil the potatoes till nicely cooked and soft then Peel and mash them to a smooth mash.
itemListElement.name: Boil the potatoes till nicely cooked and soft then Peel and mash them to a smooth mash.

itemListElement.text: Add in everything else and mix well and keep aside.
itemListElement.name: Add in everything else and mix well and keep aside.

itemListElement.text: Mix in everything and knead to a soft dough. Keep aside for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Mix in everything and knead to a soft dough. Keep aside for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Knead dough again and make into balls. I got about 8 balls of about 2/3 size of my palm. Make balls depending on the size of the flat bread you want.
itemListElement.name: Knead dough again and make into balls. I got about 8 balls of about 2/3 size of my palm. Make balls depending on the size of the flat bread you want.

itemListElement.text: Take one ball and roll it out to 8 inch circle. While rolling keep the center thick and the edges thin.
itemListElement.name: Take one ball and roll it out to 8 inch circle. While rolling keep the center thick and the edges thin.

itemListElement.text: Put 2 tablespoon stuffing in the middle.
itemListElement.name: Put 2 tablespoon stuffing in the middle.

itemListElement.text: Fold up opposite sides to form a rectangle or square.
itemListElement.name: Fold up opposite sides to form a rectangle or square.

itemListElement.text: Roll it out slowly using flour to get about 1/8 inch thick paratha.
itemListElement.name: Roll it out slowly using flour to get about 1/8 inch thick paratha.

itemListElement.text: Cook it on a hot flat pan on medium high heat.
itemListElement.name: Cook it on a hot flat pan on medium high heat.

itemListElement.text: Turn it after 2 minutes and apply 3-4 drops of oil to the cooked side.
itemListElement.name: Turn it after 2 minutes and apply 3-4 drops of oil to the cooked side.

itemListElement.text: Cook for another 2 minutes on both sides or until paratha looks crisp. golden and brown.
itemListElement.name: Cook for another 2 minutes on both sides or until paratha looks crisp. golden and brown.

itemListElement.text: Serve hot with curd and indian pickle!
itemListElement.name: Serve hot with curd and indian pickle!

keywords: easy recipe, flat bread, Indian bread
